Subject: [bitcoin/bitcoin] Debug.log file does not generated? (#12420)


I am trying to compile in ubuntu 16.04, changed source code little bit and tried compile,

Typed 'make install' and error says, "recipe for target 'install-recursive' failed".

I revised source like this, chainparams.cpp : 123~126 line around approx.assert(consensus.hashGenesisBlock == uint256S("0x"));   // deleted whole after '0x' to spit out error and then debug.log file will show the right value?

but after try, debug.log file itself does not generated.
